data.title: All you need to know about Kate Winslet's love life
data.meta_description: Here is everything you need to know about Avatar actress Kate Winslet's love life so far.
data.text:
Low down on Kate Winslet’s love life

From messy to dreamy, here is all you need to know about Avatar actress Kate Winslet.

Stephen Tredre

When Kate was 15, she was in a relationship with Tredre, 12 years senior to her. They broke up in 1995 but were close until he died of cancer 2 years later.

Tredre’s influence

The actress considered him a major influence in her life and when he died, Kate missed the premiere of Titanic to attend his funeral.

Jim Threapleton

Jim, a filmmaker, and Kate met on a movie set, right after the actress finished shooting Titanic. They got married in 1998 after dating for a year.

The marriage

The couple even have a daughter, Mia, together but after 2 years of marriage, it all fell apart after their daughter turned one. They filed for a divorce.

Reasons for divorce

According to Kate, the divorce was necessary as Jim had begun controlling her career and even suggested roles that were not so good for her.

Sam Mendes

After her divorce from Jim, Kate met Sam. They dated for 2 years and later got married. They had a son, Joe, together in 2003.

The marriage

Sam & Kate went separate ways in 2010 for reasons best known to the couple.
